County Hospital, Ogba Lagos remains open to customers on Tuesday contrary to news making the rounds that it has suspended its operations over contacts with Coronavirus patients.
Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more great videos: http://www.youtube.com/t… [+164 chars]

articles.author: Janine Graham
articles.title: What happened around the world while you were sleeping - Manning River Times
articles.description: Our COVID-19 Informer will keep you up to date with everything you need to know today.
